content: It seems like Zulip is missing some recent emoji. It has :hug: (:hug:), but it doesn't have :people_hugging: (ü´Ç).
The latter is useful as a reaction, to omit the happy grin of the former in favor of comfort.
i miss the custom emoji capabilities of Slack here, but they admittedly can get out of control sometimes
Yeah, on balance I do think I'm glad they're not a thing here, but I get the appeal.
But Zulip seems to support custom emojis fine: https://zulip.com/help/custom-emoji

Yes, but regular users can't. From the custom emoji config page:

Only organization administrators can add custom emoji in this organization.
Permissions for uploading custom emoji are configurable: https://zulip.com/help/custom-emoji#editing-permissions
